name: Barry Frost
Barry Frost
Splash
Just drank: Tea (Just testing with Teacup).
Handy pollen/hayfever status web app that I‚Äôll surely be using daily this summer: https://pollen.fyi https://twitter.com/almonk/status/852092612618092545
I use @culturedcode‚Äôs Things to track pretty much everything I do, so I‚Äôm looking forward to May‚Äôs long-awaited V3: https://culturedcode.com/things/blog/2017/04/things-3-is-coming/
It‚Äôs not often said, but well done @BTCare/@OpenreachGB. First working day after reporting intermittent broadband: engineer visited + fixed.
Previous series of The Walking Dead disappeared from Sky Box Sets today. Found them on Amazon Prime video instead. Bad form, @SkyHelpTeam.
‚ÄúThe 50 Best Britpop Albums‚Äù. Not sure all are /Britpop/, but god, I own and still listen to almost all of these. http://pitchfork.com/features/lists-and-guides/10045-the-50-best-britpop-albums/
iOS 10.3 brings wifi and 4G calling for O2 (UK). NB: you need to disable their TU Go service (my request is pending) http://www.o2.co.uk/help/network-coverage-and-international/wifi-and-4g-calling
Very strong morning at #WXGFIVE . Highlight was relearning everything about social media from @TheSocialChain‚Äôs omnipotent @SteveBartlettSC.
I‚Äôm in Covent Garden, London, not far from today‚Äôs attack and marking myself safe.
Samuel‚Äôs story: a heartwarming, eye-moistening video, no matter who you support. https://twitter.com/MU_Foundation/status/830041736122626048
Sitting in today‚Äôs product demo at work and realising that my age now qualifies me for our ‚Äúmature‚Äù online dating sites #oldfogey
Cracking afternoon at the rugby yesterday. #6nations #engfra
Great memories of Chelmsford and gigs in my youth listening to @BBClamacqshow earlier tonight: The Army & Navy, The Y and @BassmentBar

(Just testing with Teacup).

https://pollen.fyi

‚ÄúThe 50 Best Britpop Albums‚Äù. Not sure all are /Britpop/, but god, I own and still listen to almost all of these.

http://pitchfork.com/features/lists-and-guides/10045-the-50-best-britpop-albums/

Very strong morning at #WXGFIVE . Highlight was relearning everything about social media from @TheSocialChain‚Äôs omnipotent @SteveBartlettSC.

Great memories of Chelmsford and gigs in my youth listening to @BBClamacqshow earlier tonight: The Army & Navy, The Y and @BassmentBar

I‚Äôve just backed Manton Reece‚Äòs ‚ÄúIndie Microblogging: owning your short-form writing‚Äù Kickstarter project. It‚Äôs a book and upcoming micro blogging platform (Micro.blog) that dovetails neatly with my thoughts and work on the IndieWeb.

As I‚Äôve noted before, Manton aims to support many of the same technologies I‚Äôve implemented on this site and I‚Äôm happy to support him in developing his platform. His vocal support for the IndieWeb is a welcome high-profile voice. Good luck, Manton.
